<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Prédictions calculées avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"predictions":{"description":"Prédictions du cycle","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"nextPeriodStart":{"type":"string","description":"Date prédite des prochaines règles","example":"2024-02-12T00:00:00.000Z"},"nextOvulation":{"type":"string","description":"Date prédite de la prochaine ovulation","example":"2024-01-28T00:00:00.000Z"},"confidence":{"type":"number","description":"Niveau de confiance de la prédiction (%)","example":87.5,"minimum":0,"maximum":100},"currentCycleDay":{"type":"number","description":"Jour actuel dans le cycle","example":14},"currentPhase":{"type":"string","description":"Phase actuelle du cycle","enum":["MENSTRUAL","FOLLICULAR","OVULATION","LUTEAL"],"example":"OVULATION"},"daysUntilNextPeriod":{"type":"number","description":"Jours jusqu'aux prochaines règles","example":14},"daysUntilOvulation":{"type":"number","description":"Jours jusqu'à la prochaine ovulation","example":0}},"required":["nextPeriodStart","nextOvulation","confidence","currentCycleDay","currentPhase","daysUntilNextPeriod","daysUntilOvulation"],"title":"CyclePredictionDto"}]},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Message informatif","example":"Prédictions calculées avec 87% de confiance basées sur vos 6 derniers cycles"}},"required":["predictions","message"],"title":"CyclePredictionsResponseDto"}}}},"404":{"description":"Pas assez de données pour les prédictions"}}}
 id="cycle-controller-get-cycle-predictions-responses">
